vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Μελχεί (Rec. -χί), indecl., ὁ (Heb. מֶלֶךְ),
Melchi: Luk.3:24, 28.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.24;
son of: Jannai (G2388);
father of: Levi (G3017)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Melqui, Melquí: (1) padre de Levi (LUK.3:24) ; (2) padre de Neri, Nerí (LUC.3:28)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
麥基 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 「我王、我參謀」
1) 在基督的家譜中, 雅拿的兒子 (路3:24)
2) 在基督的家譜中, 亞底的兒子 (路3:28)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
麦基这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是「我王、我参谋」
1) 在基督的家谱中, 雅拿的儿子(路3:24)
2) 在基督的家谱中, 亚底的儿子(路3:28)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.28;
son of: Addi (G0078);
father of: Neri (G3518)
